definition: copper wall, iron bastion (idiom); impenetrable defense
copper (chemistry)/see also 紅銅|红铜[hong2 tong2]/CL:塊|块[kuai4]

sentences.english: Comrades! What is a true bastion of iron?
sentences.chinese: 同志們，真正的銅牆鐵壁是什麼？

sentences.english: What is a true bastion of iron?
sentences.chinese: 真正的銅牆鐵壁是什麼？

sentences.english: Your team becomes a virtual wall of swords.
sentences.chinese: 你的隊伍將會像銅牆鐵壁一樣牢不可破。

sentences.english: Visualize their negative words and actions bouncing off this wall like arrows on a stone fortress. They simply fall to the ground.
sentences.chinese: 把他們負面的言辭和行爲想象成射在銅牆鐵壁上的箭。

sentences.english: Like an iron bastion, the dam withstood the rushing floodwaters.
sentences.chinese: 大壩好似銅牆鐵壁，頂住了洪水的衝擊。

sentences.english: The British belief in the "bastion of Empire" was infectious.
sentences.chinese: 英國人對於“帝國的銅牆鐵壁”的信仰是有感染力的。

sentences.english: Comrades! Are they really iron bastions?
sentences.chinese: 同志們，這果然是銅牆鐵壁嗎？
